          EPOS, EPOS Recommends

          8 Best Chocolates in Singapore

          Posted on July 6, 2022November 4, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          Indulging in chocolate is not just for Valentine’s Day or birthdays or some other special occasion. If you ask me, they’re a sweet luxury that’s very easy to crave and treat yourself with – in moderation, of course. Whether you like white, milk or dark chocolates, with nuts or berries or added flavours, or even homemade, artisanal chocolates that melt in your mouth, a chocolate-y treat is always satisfying!

          So for my fellow chocoholics, I’ve got a delicious treat for you: 8 of the best chocolates in Singapore!

          Contents hide
          Best chocolate in Singapore
          1. Anjalichocolat
          2. The Dark Gallery
          3. Fossa Chocolate
          4. Hello Chocolate
          5. Laurent Bernard Chocolatier
          6. Janice Wong
          7. Mr. Bucket Chocolaterie
          8. Wimbly Lu
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          Best chocolate in Singapore

          1. Anjalichocolat

          Source: Anjalichocolat via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.anjalichocolat.com/

          Address: 163 Tanglin Road, Singapore 247933

          Operating Hours: Daily, 10am-6pm

          Local artisan chocolatier, Anjalichocolat, provides fresh, luxurious chocolates that are absolutely drool-worthy. They not only create fresh batches of chocolates everyday, but design them with unusual flavours that you may not think work but do! You’ll find bestsellers like lemon pistachio, star anise, mango lime, lavender, Mayan chili, and lemongrass coconut. Of course, for those of you who prefer to be less adventurous (I totally understand), they have a decadent selection of popular flavours like dark chocolate, almond, salted caramel, rum and raisin, and more. Anjalichocolat also has a “From Singapore Lah” collection where you can explore local flavours for some of the best chocolate in Singapore!

          2. The Dark Gallery

          Source: The Dark Gallery via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://thedarkgallery.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Love, love, love dark chocolate? Then The Dark Gallery may be your new go-to shop for the best dark chocolate in Singapore! They believe that producing chocolate is an art, a craft that unravels cacao into wondrous treats. At The Dark Gallery, explore the finest single origin chocolates in hot chocolate shots, ice cream, cakes, desserts and more! Discover the dark at this boutique cafe where you can find not only chocolate, but delectable dark chocolate desserts for your simple pleasures.

          3. Fossa Chocolate

          Source: Fossa Chocolate via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.fossachocolate.com/

          Address: Locations

          Want something a little extra, not so… vanilla? Fossa Chocolate doesn’t just do normal chocolate! Instead, they offer the best chocolate in Singapore with bold, new flavours! Explore bold, new flavours like pickled ume, umami seaweed and toasty genmai, jasmine, various teas like chrysanthemum and oolong, spicy mala, and more! What’s more, Fossa Chocolate handcrafts their confectionery from scratch: from roasting and cracking cacao beans to refining them into delicious chocolate to individually packaging each chocolate bar. Their bean-to-bar practices promise sustainable, high quality, crafted chocolate that’ll melt in your mouth and leave you craving more.

          4. Hello Chocolate

          Source: Hello Chocolate via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://hellochocolate.asia/

          If you’re looking for the best chocolate in Singapore, but also worldwide, look no further than Hello Chocolate! They bring to you a collection of the best of the best bean-to-bar chocolates from around the world, easily available to you online. Hello Chocolate aims to refine and redefine chocolate to be more than just sweet, tasteless blocks, and add more flavour, nuance and, most importantly, quality to them. Here, you’ll find your regular white, milk and dark chocolate, but also vegan, low-sugar or sugar-free, baking, fruity, nutty and Halal-friendly chocolates so everyone can enjoy!

          P.S. You can get same day delivery for orders in Singapore!

          5. Laurent Bernard Chocolatier

          Source: Laurent Bernard Chocolatier via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.laurentbernard.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          There’s no doubt that France makes some of the best chocolates in the world and so, when Laurent Bernard brought his skills, knowledge and crafts from France to Singapore, there’s no exception. Developed and handcrafted with painstaking care, skill and excellence, you’ll find unique and indulgence chocolate made from the finest and ethically sourced ingredients at Laurent Bernard Chocolatier. It’s quality rather than quantity at this chocolatier. Find treats for any occasion, and gourmet delicacies that’ll satiate your sweet tooth!

          6. Janice Wong

          Source: Janice Wong via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://janicewong.online/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Opened by Chef Janice Wong in 2014, this confectionery brand was created to push the boundaries of dessert making. They have not only custom bon bons, cakes and ice creams, but have expanded their scope towards innovation and creativity. Find edible art, 3-D printed chocolates and chocolate crayons and more among other creative projects! Each individual chocolate is carefully curated and handcrafted to give your tastebuds delightful sensations and expand upon traditional chocolate-making. So if you’re looking for some of the best chocolate in Singapore, Janice Wong is a must-try!

          7. Mr. Bucket Chocolaterie

          Source: Mr. Bucket Chocolaterie via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://mrbucket.com.sg/

          Address: 23 Sin Ming Rd, Singapore 570023

          Operating Hours: Tue-Fri, 11am-7pm | Sat, Sun & PH, 10am-7pm

          Indulge in the  myriad of flavours that Singapore’s local region can provide, with unique and unexpected combinations that will astonish you. Mr. Bucket provides bean-to-bar luxury chocolate made from cacao sustainably sourced from Asia, including bon bons, bars, drinking chocolate, and even chocolate liqueur! Experience unusual tastes like peanut butter and jelly, mala, calamansi, cookies & cream, gingerbread and more! As they say at Mr. Bucket, their inspiration comes from everyday conversations and flavours, bringing you chocolates you’ve never experienced before.

          8. Wimbly Lu

          Source: Wimbly Lu via Facebook – Best Chocolate in Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.wimblylu.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Having started off as a quiet, quaint cafe with scrumptious homemade desserts and handmade chocolates, Wimbly Lu has grown through continuous passion and love for all things desserts! Not only does it have hearty food, great drinks and desserts like ice creams and cakes, they also have handmade chocolate truffles! Choose from flavours like earl grey, milk, dark, matcha, salted caramel and orange, or alcoholic truffles like  baileys, rum & raisin, and champagne! It’s the perfect place to go with friends and family to enjoy delicious desserts and some of the best chocolate in Singapore!

          Conclusion

          Chocoholics, are you satisfied? If not, these 8 best chocolate shops in Singapore will be sure to satiate your sweet tooth with their delicious chocolates!

          P.S. Burn off the extra calories at the gym or yoga studio!

          P.P.S. Want more sweet treats? Check out our other posts!
